text: Sorso (Sòssu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 14,732 people lived there. Its area is 67.01 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 136 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Sorso
